channel.title: CVE Feed for Oracle Corporation -- Self-Service Human Resources
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Oracle Corporation -- Self-Service Human Resources

item.title: CVE-2023-22009|2024-08-02T09:59:28.698Z -- oracle%20corporation -- self-service%20human%20resources
item.description: Vulnerability in the Oracle Self-Service Human Resources product of Oracle E-Business Suite (component: Workforce Management). Supported versions that are affected are 12.2.3-12.2.12. Easily exploitable vulnerability allows low privileged attacker with network access via HTTP to compromise Oracle Self-Service Human Resources. Successful attacks of this vulnerability can result in unauthorized read access to a subset of Oracle Self-Service Human Resources accessible data. CVSS 3.1 Base Score 4.3 (Confidentiality impacts). CVSS Vector: (CVSS:3.1/AV:N/AC:L/PR:L/UI:N/S:U/C:L/I:N/A:N).

item.title: CVE-2023-21834|2024-08-02T09:51:51.206Z -- oracle%20corporation -- self-service%20human%20resources
item.description: Vulnerability in the Oracle Self-Service Human Resources product of Oracle E-Business Suite (component: Workflow, Approval, Work Force Management). Supported versions that are affected are 12.2.3-12.2.12. Easily exploitable vulnerability allows low privileged attacker with network access via HTTP to compromise Oracle Self-Service Human Resources. Successful attacks of this vulnerability can result in unauthorized update, insert or delete access to some of Oracle Self-Service Human Resources accessible data. CVSS 3.1 Base Score 4.3 (Integrity impacts). CVSS Vector: (CVSS:3.1/AV:N/AC:L/PR:L/UI:N/S:U/C:N/I:L/A:N).
